fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.design

Interface IListDesign

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IAttachable, IDataDesign, IThemedDesign

    public interface IListDesign
extends IDataDesign
    Defines the design for a list page for an authenticated user, for navigating records.

    Note: implementations are permitted to defer persistence of design configuration changes for up to a second, to efficiently store a batch of changes. If the design configuration is externally updated when changes are pending (for example, by modifying a configuration file) then the deferred changes will be lost.

    Thread safety: implementations are required to be safe for concurrent read/write access.

    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    REFLEXE Technologies
    See Also:
    IListPage, IDesignService.getFormDesigns()

    • Method Detail

      • getPageItemCount

        int getPageItemCount()
        Gets the maximum number of items per page by default.
        Returns:
        the maximum number of items per page, in the range [1..Integer.MAX_VALUE].
        Since:
        1.0
        See Also:
        setPageItemCount(int), IDataViewService.ITEMS_PER_PAGE

      • setPageItemCount

        void setPageItemCount(int pageItemCount)
               throws ConcurrentModificationException
        Sets the maximum number of items per page by default.
        Parameters:
        pageItemCount - the maximum number of items per page, in the range [1..Integer.MAX_VALUE].
        Throws:
        ConcurrentModificationException - if the design configuration was externally updated when invoking this method.
        Since:
        1.0
        See Also:
        getPageItemCount()
